title: Is it Possible ?
body: So i was playing ARURF Mode , And in middle of game Our Jinx started chasing on champions only to get lured and die , So after telling her to retreat ( via Signal ) many times she didnt listen and  went chasing Ashe who had like 30% hp left ....Guess what happened {{champion:22}}  with her Ult stunned her and took care of jinx with 100% without getting a scratch ......Meanwhile we had 2 inhibitors down so i signaled her dead body with Mia to figure what was she trying to do ....then she started flaming i am gonna report u bla bla bla and after defeat screen she started acting victim infront of enemy and laughed i will get banned ...For what ? is it possible to get banned without any actual reason ?

replies.body:
I already had multiple people try that on me today. I am a very blunt person and people tend to not like that. 
Now I was an ass hole to one of these people because in the post game screen he said "report nyx for saying the "N" word and the other "F" word multiple times"
I added him, explained how the automatic system works and called him a braindead idiot for thinking he could get me banned when it can see the chat >.<

Still not banned so, yea you wont get banned.

>I added him, explained how the automatic system works and called him a braindead idiot for thinking he could get me banned when it can see the chat >.<

why bother?

> [{quoted}](name=The Cream Reaper,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VzhqMpBP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-22T10:20:07.147+0000)
>
> why bother?

Because im an ass.

>Because im an ass.

sorry but a true ass would not have bothered

> [{quoted}](name=The Cream Reaper,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VzhqMpBP,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T10:48:58.014+0000)
>
> sorry but a true ass would not have bothered

not really bothered me, It was more or less to rub it in their face that I did not get banned. Thats what ass holes do.

> [{quoted}](name=The Cream Reaper,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VzhqMpBP,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T13:41:24.009+0000)
>
> you're cute
> 
> {{sticker:sg-syndra}}

sorry syndra, i dont like sm
Don't worry. You'll be fine. If you didn't say anything bad yourself, no worries.
You won't be punished for it, but being ? pinged can be very tilting and definately won't help you win.

funny this got posted right after my post XD
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/N2mYicVc-design-and-its-impact-in-player-communication
nope unless you said something in chat you will not get punished.

> [{quoted}](name=DaenrysTargaryen,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VzhqMpBP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-22T09:57:07.854+0000)
>
> nope unless you said something in chat you will not get punished.

i havent used any kind of word that could be mean i think ...sinceEven using Noob will  get people Angry these days ...But i was concerned i ve been playing this game since Release of Zed all that hardwork will that be Vanished in thin air just cause Someone will report me without good reason will really suck{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
